title: RAND Experts to Discuss Surge in Misinformation/Disinformation Amid Israel-Hamas War
descriptions: RAND experts will discuss the rapidly degrading environment for authentic information about the Israel-Hamas war, amplified by the proliferation of generative AI. They'll discuss the roles and responsibilities of social media platforms as well as the implications of widespread disinformation on both national security and violence in the United States.

image.desc: Map of southern Israel with a magnifying glass enlarging Gaza Strip, photo by pawel.gaul/Getty Images

sub_content.What: RAND experts will discuss the rapidly degrading environment for authentic information about the Israel-Hamas war, amplified by the proliferation of generative AI. They'll discuss the roles and responsibilities of social media platforms as well as the implications of widespread disinformation on both national security and violence in the United States.

sub_content.When: Thursday, October 19, 1:00 pm ET/10:00 am PT

sub_content.Where: To join this virtual conversation, please contact media@rand.org for a link. Please note this discussion is limited to journalists.

sub_content.Interviews:
To arrange an interview, contact the RAND Office of Media Relations:
